# MLB API Raw Responses

This directory holds raw responses from the MLB Stats API, used to build `mlb_venue_city_state.json`.

## Generated by script

Run the build script **without** `--from-saved` to fetch and save automatically:

```bash
python -m app.projects.sports_schedule_admin.scripts.build_mlb_venue_mapping
```

## Manual fetch (optional)

If you prefer to fetch and save responses yourself:

1. **Teams** (one per minor league level):

   | File                | URL                                                                 |
   |---------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------|
   | `teams_sport_11.json` | https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/teams?season=2025&sportId=11 |
   | `teams_sport_12.json` | https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/teams?season=2025&sportId=12 |
   | `teams_sport_13.json` | https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/teams?season=2025&sportId=13 |
   | `teams_sport_14.json` | https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/teams?season=2025&sportId=14 |

2. **Venues**: For each `venue.id` in the teams responses:
   - URL: `https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/venues/{id}?hydrate=location`
   - Save to: `venues/{id}.json` (e.g. `venues/2541.json`)

3. Run with `--from-saved` to generate the mapping from your saved files:
   ```bash
   python -m app.projects.sports_schedule_admin.scripts.build_mlb_venue_mapping --from-saved
   ```
